headline.main: War Crimes Proposal Would Help U.N. Build Cases on Syria

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Diplomats are making a push to enable the United Nations to collect, preserve and analyze evidence of war crimes in Syria and prepare cases for a tribunal....
lead_paragraph: Diplomats are making a push to enable the United Nations to collect, preserve and analyze evidence of war crimes in Syria and prepare cases for a tribunal.
